Content:
Have a iPhone and a motorcycle with a powerful or high displacement motor?
Apple says mounting it (the phone) on the handlebar could lead to damage.
https://www.yahoo.com/tech/motorcycle-monday-motorcycle-could-damage-190000858.html

I've got a 300cc and stem mounted android phone.

Title: iPhone mounted on powerful motorcycle Apple warning
